Text: An .exe from a newbie... I\'ll try and keep you guys posted!!!
Happy to report: \"All System Go\".nnThanks for this!!!
Your welcome, i wanted to put some preview planes in the menu but FSX dont support the FS9 way
Fonts are missing? Autopilot does not engage?
And how to click the buttons, because they are not working?
oh yh i forgot about the fonts, ok this is what im gonna do, im gonna update the nav data and include the fonts in another installer. I will try and upload that tonight

The buttons do not work in the virtual cockpit because it is fs9 vc. to use the buttons u have to use the 2d panel and the 2d overhead panel. To access the 2d overhead panel u need to go to the views menu then select it under instrument panel
ok ive uploaded the fix, sorry about that issue nnhttp://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5684567/PSS_777_FSX_-_nav_data__amp__font_fix.exe
Ok, but in 2D panels they are not working too ............ anyone help?? Maybe you have some other things installed with this 777?

When fsx starts and u select the plane u should see a window pop up asking you to to trust the file, you should select ok and the 2d panel should work.the only other thing i have installed is fsuipc, so prolly if u get that it will work. if u guys didnt trust the file all u have to do is go the fsx.cfg file in your roaming folder and look for PSS-B777.gau and if u see the value 0 u need to change that to a 2.
Autopilot barely works and the autothrottle doesn\'t work. Plane keeps going up and down when on autopilot.
ok so i realize that this thing still has flaws with the autopilot, im going to be working on that and upload another fix, the autothrottle works tho
